mc.flavorText: Tainted by a thousand fears.

mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a red spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Forged by a thousand flames.

mc.name: Wooden Sphere
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player plays a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: Strengthened by a thousand limbs.

mc.name: Star Compass
mc.oracleText:
Star Compass comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color a basic land you control could produce.
mc.printedText:
Star Compass comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color a basic land you control could produce.
mc.flavorText: It doesn't point north. It points home.

mc.name: Urza's Mine
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.

mc.name: Patagia Golem
mc.oracleText: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: Its wings were only designed to be ornamental, but it learned to use them on its own.

mc.name: Rod of Ruin
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Rod of Ruin deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: The rod is a relic from ancient times . . . cruel, vicious, mean-spirited times.

mc.name: Fodder Cannon
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Fodder Cannon deals 4 damage to target creature.
mc.flavorText:
Step 1: Find your cousin.
Step 2: Get your cousin in the cannon.
Step 3: Find another cousin.

mc.name: Urza's Tower
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {3} to your mana pool instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {3} to your mana pool instead.

mc.name: Urza's Power Plant
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.

mc.name: Phyrexian Hulk
mc.flavorText:
It doesn't think. It doesn't feel.
It doesn't laugh or cry.
All it does from dusk till dawn
Is make the soldiers die.
--Onean children's rhyme

mc.name: Brass Herald
mc.oracleText:
As Brass Herald comes into play, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
mc.printedText:
As Brass Herald comes into play, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

mc.name: Distorting Lens
mc.oracleText: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The Eye altering alters all."
--William Blake, "The Mental Traveller"

mc.name: Howling Mine
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws a card.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws a card.
mc.flavorText: Legend has it that the mine howls out the last words of those who died inside.

mc.name: Millstone
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: More than one mage has been driven insane by the sound of the millstone relentlessly grinding away.

mc.name: Disrupting Scepter
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Target player discards a card from his or her hand. Play this ability only during your turn.
mc.flavorText: "True power is controlling not only the hearts of your subjects, but their minds as well."

mc.name: Skull of Orm
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText: Though lifeless, the skull still possessed a strange power over the flow of magic.

mc.name: Ensnaring Bridge
mc.oracleText: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
mc.printedText: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
mc.flavorText:
"Why build a bridge that needs to be guarded?"
--Elvish champion

mc.name: Vexing Arcanix
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to him or her.

mc.name: Dingus Egg
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a land is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Egg deals 2 damage to that land's controller.
mc.flavorText: Legend has it that the world was hatched from a dingus egg.

mc.name: Defense Grid
mc.oracleText: Each spell costs {3} more to play except during its controller's turn.
mc.printedText: During each player's turn, each other player's spells cost {3} more to play.
mc.flavorText:
"A good deal of tyranny goes by the name of protection."
--Crystal Eastman,
"Equality or Protection"

mc.name: Jayemdae Tome
mc.oracleText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {4}, {T}: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Knowledge is power."
--Sir Francis Bacon, Meditationes Sacrae

mc.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards. (That player draws his or her card for the turn first.)

mc.name: Urza's Armor
mc.oracleText: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
mc.printedText: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.
mc.flavorText: Urza protected his body well, but neglected his soul.

mc.name: Coat of Arms
mc.oracleText: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play that shares a creature type with it. (For example, if a Goblin Warrior, a Goblin Scout, and a Zombie Goblin are in play, each gets +2/+2.)
mc.printedText: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature in play that shares a creature type with it. (For example, if there are three Goblins in play, each gets +2/+2.)
mc.flavorText:
"Hup, two, three, four,
Dunno how to count no more."
--Mogg march

mc.name: Planar Portal
mc.oracleText: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: These devices have been known to pull entire worlds through the Aether.

mc.name: Aladdin's Ring
mc.oracleText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText:
"A good lamp will light your way. A good ring will clear it."
--Nervan, royal jeweler

mc.name: Beast of Burden
mc.oracleText: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures in play.
mc.printedText: Beast of Burden's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures in play.
mc.flavorText: The heavier the load, the harder it works.

mc.name: Flying Carpet
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: Woven from strands of griffin mane and pegasus tail.

mc.name: Phyrexian Colossus
mc.oracleText:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
mc.printedText:
Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step.
Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus.
Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

mc.name: Coastal Tower
mc.oracleText:
Coastal Tower comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Coastal Tower comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: A beacon in the night, a dream in the fog.

mc.name: Salt Marsh
mc.oracleText:
Salt Marsh comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Salt Marsh comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText:
Only death breeds in stagnant water.
--Urborg saying

mc.name: Urborg Volcano
mc.oracleText:
Urborg Volcano comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Urborg Volcano comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Deep in the heart of Urborg lie massive volcanoes whose thick black smoke covers the land with perpetual darkness.

mc.name: Shivan Oasis
mc.oracleText:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Shivan Oasis comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

mc.name: Elfhame Palace
mc.oracleText:
Elfhame Palace comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
Elfhame Palace comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: The elfhames are the closest thing to "civilization" the elves allow themselves.

mc.name: Wall of Spears
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
First strike
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.flavorText:
"A stick is your friend. A pointed stick is your good friend. An army of pointed sticks is your best friend."
--Onean sergeant

mc.name: Avatar of Hope
mc.oracleText:
If you have 3 life or less, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to play.
Flying
Avatar of Hope can block any number of creatures.
mc.printedText:
If you have 3 life or less, Avatar of Hope costs {6} less to play.
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)

mc.name: Coastal Piracy
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."

mc.name: Call of the Wild
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: From a whisper to a roar, the call is heard by all and refused by none.

mc.name: Lhurgoyf
mc.oracleText: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
mc.printedText: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
mc.flavorText:
"Ach Hans, run It's the lhurgoyf"
--Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

mc.name: Craw Wurm
mc.flavorText: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

mc.name: Gluttonous Zombie
mc.oracleText: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.printedText: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.flavorText: Greed and gluttony led him to death. Now they are his greatest assets.

mc.name: Hibernation
mc.oracleText: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Return all green permanents to their owners' hands.
mc.flavorText: The deep sleep of winter is not always restful.

mc.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
mc.oracleText: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.
mc.printedText: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment in play.
mc.flavorText: Her roots connect her to the forest's wishes.

mc.name: Eager Cadet
mc.flavorText: "Training? Seeing my crops burnt to cinders was all the --'training' I needed."

mc.name: Giant Octopus
mc.flavorText:
"Before my eyes was a horrible monster, worthy to figure in the legends of the marvellous. . . . Its eight arms, or rather feet, fixed to its head . . . were twice as long as its body, and were twisted like the furies' hair."
--Jules Verne, Twenty Thousand Leagues under the Sea, trans. Lewis

mc.name: Sea Eagle
mc.oracleText: Flying
mc.printedText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.)
mc.flavorText: Where air meets water, fish meets talon.

mc.name: Enormous Baloth
mc.flavorText: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.

mc.name: Vengeance
mc.oracleText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.printedText: Destroy target tapped creature.
mc.flavorText: Bitter as wormwood, sweet as mulled wine.

mc.name: Vizzerdrix
mc.flavorText: A bored wizard once created a vizzerdrix out of a bunny and a piranha. He never made that mistake again.

mc.name: Karma
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps he or she controls.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Karma deals damage to that player equal to the number of Swamps he or she controls. (Your upkeep step is after you untap and before you draw.)

mc.name: Rhox
mc.oracleText:
You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText:
You may have Rhox deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
{2}{G}: Regenerate Rhox.

mc.name: Hammer of Bogardan
mc.oracleText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep.
mc.printedText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Play this ability only during your upkeep. (Your upkeep step is after you untap and before you draw.)

mc.name: Silverback Ape
mc.flavorText: It does not wear a crown or sit on a throne of gold, but those who have witnessed its power hail it nonetheless.
